channel.title: Taga on Alessandro Minoccheri
channel.description: Recent content in Taga on Alessandro Minoccheri

item.title: Symfony + AWS Lambda Part1
item.description: Symfony is one of the most used frameworks in the PHP world. Nowadays talking about serverless is common, so it’s very important to know how to use Symfony with this technology. In the following article, I have described how to deploy a Symfony application to AWS Lambda using Bref. This is the first part, the second part will be posted very soon! Stay tuned! Symfony AWS Lambda Part 1
